name: Mage of Light
description:
Game Overview

What if your depression and anxiety were literal monsters you could battle and slay?  

Built in the 3D Unity engine, Mage of Light is a narrative video game experience currently in development at Chapman University. The project helps its players address mental health, depression, and anxiety through the lens of an action/adventure video game. By overcoming the demons in their minds, the player grows in strength and learns that they have the power to conquer real-life monsters with the power and light within themselves.
